room_title: Escape room "Sherlocked" by Escape This Madison in Madison
review: So much fun! We barely ran out of time before completing our Sherlocked experience, but that just means it was the kind of challenge that kept us on our toes and having a good time.

room_title: Escape room "Sherlocked" by Escape This Madison in Madison
review: Our team did the Sherlock'd room and had a blast. The detail of the room was amazing and intricacy of the puzzles made for a seriously challenging and fun experience. We will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Sherlocked" by Escape This Madison in Madison
review: We had a group of 11 and we did the Sherlocked theme room. This was an amazing experience and our team got out with 1 second left on the clock! Escape This is extremely professional making our time there fun and enjoyable. We will be back!

room_title: Escape room "Sherlocked" by Escape This Madison in Madison
review: I tried Sherlock Holmes room and I loved it. I have been in 5 other escape rooms and this one was the best. Every clue had a meaning and everything was connected. Very smart! I can't wait to try other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Sherlocked" by Escape This Madison in Madison
review: Best escape room ever! We did Sherlocked. While we didn't escape, we loved it. Eric was awesome and gave us subtle clues without giving it away.
